Author: AirgeadCoin Official
Title: [ANN] Airgead Coin - Merge Precious Metals Into 1 Coin
Body: The merging of those metals will be done digitally.  All precious metals can be merged in infinite variations under our digital Airgead Coin.  Once our Exchange begins to trade all precious metals and coins, we will begin to accept personal precious metal holdings within our authorized storage facilities.  This means that you will be able to have physical holdings that you can take out at any time you wish.   More information about the benefits Once your Precious Metals are transferred into your Digital Wallet you will have a number of options: Hold onto your Precious Metals. Sell your Precious Metals on the Airgead Exchange. Use the value of your Precious Metals to purchase goods and services. Exchange the value for more Airgead Tokens, ensuring more Precious Metals as dividends.

Author: BitPotus
Title: [ANN] Airgead Coin - Merge Precious Metals Into 1 Coin
Body: on look...  another rehash of the "Precious Metal backed" crypto ICO...  FFS.  This scam has been done like a million times on bitcointalk...

Author: AirgeadCoin Official
Title: [ANN] Airgead Coin - Merge Precious Metals Into 1 Coin
Body: Not exactly, let me explain why.  Yes, our currency is backed by either Gold, Silver Palladium etc.  But the main idea behind AirgeadCoin is that it will let users to merge, let's say, 1oz of Gold, 1oz of Silver and 1oz of Palladium into one coin. If the person who is doing the merging of several precious metals in one knows what they are doing, they will be able to increase the value of that coin that was previously only backed and effected by only gold.  Sellers can choose to sell their unique creation on our exchange, if there is a buyer who is looking to purchase 1oz of Gold, Silver and Palladium merged in one coin.  That's what I mean by "knows what they're doing". If you just want to make a custom coin without giving it any thought, it might become less valuable since there won't be anyone interested in purchasing it.  Think of it as a precious metal index fund all in one coin.

Author: BitPotus
Title: [ANN] Airgead Coin - Merge Precious Metals Into 1 Coin
Body: do you currently hold any precious metals?  and if you do, how much?  can the amounts of precious metals be independently verified and guaranteed to be kosher?  or do you need the ICO to buy your "precious metals stock"?

Author: AirgeadCoin Official
Title: [ANN] Airgead Coin - Merge Precious Metals Into 1 Coin
Body: do you currently hold any precious metals?  At present we do not. After the ICO and launch then the Precious Metals will be purchased, checked and stored within one of our authorized storage facilities before they are sold within the Airgead World- Wide Exchange, once they are purchased by the buyer they will be transferred into the purchasers digital Wallet for them to use or store.  Can the amounts of precious metals be independently verified and guaranteed to be kosher?  All Precious Metals held within one of our authorized storage facilities will be inspected to guarantee their authenticity, every year a fully inspected list will be individually accounted for by a certified accountant.  ICO to buy your Precious metals?  The initial ICO will be used to expand our team and implement further development of a Precious Metals Currency and then the second stage of the ICO will be used to purchase the initial amount of Precious Metals.
